title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 18 ยง 395.1 - Responsibilities relating to military service benefits
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 18 ยง 395.1 - Responsibilities relating to military service benefits

State Regulations
(a) Applicants who have previous or current
military service or who are dependents of persons with such service shall be
informed of their responsibility to apply for and utilize benefits related to
such services. (b) Full use shall
be made of the services of the New York State Division of Veterans' Affairs, its veterans' counselors and of the American National Red Cross. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 18
ยง
395.1

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
